text: Loxopterygium is a genus of plants in the family Anacardiaceae. ==Taxonomy== ===Species=== , Plants of the World online has 4 accepted species: * Loxopterygium gardneri * Loxopterygium grisebachii, * Loxopterygium huasango "Loxopterygium huasango isolate 68 maturase K (matK) gene, partial cds; chloroplast." National Center for Biotechnology Information, U.S. National Library of Medicine. (retrieved 23 Oct 2011) * Loxopterygium sagotii ==References== Category:Anacardiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Loxopterygium
